summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 19517, entitled, "An Ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block Four (4), Renton Addition to the City of Seattle, from East Pike Street to Sixteenth Avenue, by grading the same, in accordance with Resolution No. 1604 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Immediate Payment," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle," approved on the sixteenth day of November, 1908.
